title: Commercial Lawyer
description:
üßò What we offer

  • Fully remote work environment ‚Äì work from anywhere globally
  • Competitive compensation in line with global benchmarks
  • Potential to unlock equity compensation
  • A minimum of four weeks of vacation per year
  • Premium health insurance that travels with you
  • Travel insurance any time you travel outside of your home country
  • New laptop, office allowance and more!


üöÄ We look forward to hearing from you!
SafetyWing is looking for a skilled Commercial Lawyer to join our legal team. In this role, you will work closely with our Head of Legal and Regulatory Affairs and support product teams to develop innovative global products and scale existing ones. We are looking for a great communicator who can simplify complex legal concepts and provide actionable guidance to support our mission. 

üöÄ About SafetyWing
 At SafetyWing, we‚Äôre building a global social safety net for remote workers‚Äîsimple health, insurance, and retirement products designed to replace national welfare systems. Our mission is to remove geographical borders as a barrier to equal opportunity and freedom for everyone. If we succeed, we believe this will be one of the most important tasks of our time.

We‚Äôre a fully remote team of nearly 130, stretching across 15+ timezones.

üíª Your responsibilities will include

  • Collaborating with product teams to address legal challenges, support the development of new products, and scale existing offerings effectively 
  • Providing practical and strategic legal advice to support new product developments and enhance customer experience, while aligning with long term business goals
  • Drafting, reviewing, and negotiating legal agreements in partnership with product teams
  • Partnering with the sales team, providing legal support in high-value enterprise sales, including participating in client calls to facilitate deal closure 
  • Ensuring compliance with international laws, including data privacy, consumer protection, advertising, insurance regulations, and other applicable commercial laws across jurisdictions

üß™ We are looking for someone who

  • Has solid experience in negotiating and drafting a broad range of commercial agreements, particularly in SaaS, technology, or regulated industries
  • Is familiar with laws and regulations governing insurance, fintech, or similar industries across multiple jurisdictions
  • Is comfortable working in fast-paced, ambiguous environments, preferably with experience in scaling products and navigating evolving legal landscapes across international jurisdictions
  • Has demonstrated ability to identify potential legal issues early and take a proactive, solution-oriented approach
  • Has strong understanding of how legal decisions impact business operations, particularly product development and sales
  • Has proven ability to support enterprise sales teams in closing high-value deals, including direct client interaction

ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è We like to work with people who
  • Share our vision to build a global social safety net on the Internet
  • Think for themselves instead of copying others
  • Are willing to try new things, even with the risk of failure
  • Are intellectually curious and open to new ideas
  • Are creative and bold in the face of any problem
  • Have strong integrity and do the right thing

title: Senior Auth Engineer
description:
Supabase is an Open Source and fully remote company building developer tools for databases.

Auth, written in Go (server) and with client libraries for TypeScript, SSR and for other frameworks and technologies, is one of the most popular products in the Supabase stack. We are seeking someone to help us build new and maintain existing Auth features.

You have:

  • 5+ years of Software Development experience

  • Strong knowledge of web technology fundamentals (cookies, sessions, JWT, HTTP, browser APIs)

  • Good knowledge of and deep interest in authentication security (passwords, protocols such as OAuth, OIDC or SAML, cryptography fundamentals such as hash functions, signatures and ciphers)

  • Experience working with multiple web frameworks like Next.js (or other SSR alternative in the JavaScript space) and traditional web frameworks like Ruby on Rails, Django, Laravel or equivalent (in any language)

  • Strong knowledge of Go and TypeScript (languages used daily) and Postgres

  • Good technical writing skills (RFC process is an important part of making changes to the Auth product)

We offer:

  • 100% remote work from anywhere in the world. No location-based adjustment to your salary.

  • Autonomous work. We work collaboratively on projects, but you set your own pace.

  • Health, Vision and Dental benefits. Supabase covers 100% of the cost for employees and 80% for dependants

  • Generous Tech Allowance for any office setup you need

  • Annual Education Allowance

  • Annually run off-sites.

About the team

  • We're a startup. It's unstructured.

  • Collectively founded more than 30 startups.

  • Globally distributed team with more than 30 different nationalities.

  • We deeply believe in the efficacy of collaborative open source. We support existing communities and tools, rather than building "yet another xx".

  • We "dogfood" everything. If you use it in your project, we use it in Supabase.

Process

  • The entire process is fully remote and all communication will happen over email or via video chat.

  • Once you've submitted your application, the team will review your submission and may reach out for a short screening interview over a video call.

  • If you pass the screen you will be invited to up to four follow-up interviews.

  • The calls:

    • usually take between 20-45 minutes each depending on the interviewer.

    • most of the time, are all 1:1.

    • will be with the founders, a member of either the growth or engineering team (depending on the role) and usually one other person from your immediate team or function.

  • Once the interviews are over, the team will meet to discuss several roles and candidates and may:

    • ask one or two follow-up questions over email or a quick call.

    • go directly to making an offer.

title: Technical Documentation Specialist (Part-Time, Potential for Full-Time)
description:
About Synthflow

With Synthflow any business can effortlessly create custom AI phone call agents. No coding or tech skills needed‚Äîjust your data and ideas for powerful automation.¬†We‚Äôre at an exciting stage: early but fast-growing. If you love building from the ground up, moving fast, and making a huge impact, you‚Äôll fit right in.

About the Role

As a Technical Writer, you‚Äôll bridge the gap between technical teams and end-users. By collaborating with engineers, designers, and product managers, you‚Äôll craft clear, concise documentation that standardizes processes and improves cross-departmental alignment. This is a pivotal role in enhancing both internal and external understanding of our offerings.

Key Responsibilities

  • Write and maintain user-friendly how-to helpdesk articles.

  • Develop API and integrations documentation.

  • Standardize documentation across departments to ensure consistency.

  • Collaborate with teams to gather and clarify technical information.

  • Continuously improve documentation based on user feedback.

What We‚Äôre Looking For

  • Strong B2B writing skills and the ability to translate technical concepts into clear, concise content.

  • Experience in early-stage or fast-paced environments.

  • Familiarity with tools like Confluence, Notion, or similar is a plus.

  • Self-starter who can manage multiple priorities and deadlines.

  • Availability to work 20 hours per week with flexibility for growth.

Why Join Synthflow AI?

  • Own Your Work: You‚Äôll have real ownership over what you do and see your impact daily.

  • Early-Stage Excitement: Be part of a small team building something huge.

  • Equity: We‚Äôre all building this together, and everyone shares in the upside.

  • Work on Cool Stuff: You‚Äôll be documenting cutting-edge technology that‚Äôs changing how people interact with AI.

  • Remote Flexibility: Work wherever you‚Äôre most productive.

title: Processing Representative
Technical Customer Success Intern (Potential for Full-Time Conversion)
description:
This is a fully remote role, allowing you to work from anywhere in the world.

About Synthflow

At Synthflow, we‚Äôre building the easiest way for businesses to create AI-powered phone agents. It‚Äôs an exciting time at Synthflow: we‚Äôre early, fast-growing, and laser-focused on impact. Join us to do the best work of your career while helping businesses thrive.

About the Role

We‚Äôre seeking a proactive and motivated Technical Customer Success Intern to join our team. In this role, you‚Äôll play a key part in ensuring a seamless experience for our customers by managing our customer support tools, handling customer inquiries, and assisting with operational tasks. This internship is a unique opportunity to learn, grow, and potentially transition into a full-time role at Synthflow.

What You‚Äôll Do

  • Master Zendesk: Handle 20-30+ new tickets per day in Zendesk, covering everything from billing issues to helping customers implement API requests.

  • Customer Support Excellence: Respond to customer inquiries via Zendesk and email, providing thoughtful and timely resolutions.

  • Operational Assistance: Handle tasks like processing refunds and supporting other operational needs as required.

  • Continuous Learning: Stay on top of product updates and features to assist customers effectively.

  • Customer Advocacy: Create bug reports and feature requests on behalf of customers, and advocate for their prioritization.

  • Product Improvement: Test new features and functions before they are released to customers.

What You Bring

  • Eagerness to Learn: Commitment to continuous learning and skill development, particularly in technical domains.

  • Technical Mindset: Ability to distill complex technical concepts into clear, actionable solutions.

  • Strong Communication Skills: Outstanding written communication skills, with ability to adapt tone and technical depth to audience.

  • Proactive Attitude: Self-directed work style with strong independent decision-making capabilities.

  • Customer Passion: Passion for customer support with drive to excel in fast-paced environments.

Why Join Synthflow?

  • Full-Time Potential: Successful interns may be offered a full-time role, allowing you to grow with the company.

  • Ownership: You‚Äôll have real ownership over your work and see the impact of your contributions daily.

  • Early-Stage Excitement: Be part of a small, agile team building something transformative.

  • Cutting-Edge Tech: Work with innovative technology that‚Äôs reshaping how businesses interact with AI.

  • Remote Flexibility: Work wherever you‚Äôre most productive‚Äîno commute, no limits.

Apply Now! If you‚Äôre ready to kickstart your career in customer success and contribute to building something remarkable, we‚Äôd love to hear from you!

title: [ORM Agency] CEO/COO/Managing Director | Ruby Labs
description:
About us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

Role¬†

We are establishing a new B2B Online Reputation Management (ORM) company and seeking a Managing Director to oversee its operations. Over the past few years, we have developed strong relationships with providers who can enhance reputation across multiple platforms. We are now confident in our ability to deliver high-quality ORM services both to our own products and external clients, helping them improve their online image and address reputation challenges.

The Managing Director will be responsible for daily operations management, sales leadership, business execution, and building a world-class team. The company will operate as a full-service ORM provider, specializing in SEO optimization, review management, public relations, and reputation strategy.

In this role, you will build and lead a team focused on sales development, external client engagement, contract negotiations, and service delivery to third parties. This is an opportunity to develop a comprehensive ORM operation serving both internal products and external clients, while establishing strong client relationships across the industry.

Profit Share

This role comes with the profit share incentive and stock option that is quite generous for this role, more details would be shared at the interview.

The team

You will be building a strong team with high talent density who enjoy working in our fast-paced, 100% remote environment.

Employment

We offer an Independent Contractor Agreement for this position.

About you

We seek a dynamic, hands-on leader with extensive B2B experience, particularly in agency leadership (preferably in advertising, online reputation management, or similar service-based organizations). The ideal candidate should have a proven track record in sales and relationship building, while excelling at driving growth and innovation. They must demonstrate a deep understanding of product development, marketing strategies, and growth initiatives.

In this role, you will lead all departments, focusing on executing strategic initiatives and optimizing company-wide performance. The position requires proven abilities in team management, delivering results and engaging deeply with operational aspects of the business. These qualities will be essential in steering our company toward continued success.

What you‚Äôll do

  • Lead the company's strategic growth by developing and executing initiatives that drive business expansion, optimize market positioning, and advance overall progress.

  • Lead cross-functional teams in executing complex strategic initiatives, ensuring alignment across product development, growth, marketing, and sales.

  • Drive revenue growth and profitability while optimizing operational expenses.

  • Oversee the product development lifecycle, from ideation to launch, ensuring products meet market needs and quality standards.

  • Collaborate closely with engineering teams to deliver innovative solutions that align with customer expectations and business goals.

  • Ensure that the product roadmap is aligned with business strategy and customer feedback.

  • Oversee marketing campaigns, ensuring they are data-driven, customer-centric, and aligned with product launches and sales strategies.

  • Utilize data analytics to refine and optimize growth strategies, ensuring sustainable revenue growth.

  • Continuously monitor and analyze key financial and operational metrics, such as revenue growth, EBITDA margins, and customer acquisition costs (CAC).

  • Evaluate customer lifetime value (LTV) and return on ad spend (ROAS) to optimize marketing efficiency and resource allocation.

  • Track onboarding conversion rates to identify areas for improvement in user experience and increase customer activation and analyze average revenue per user (ARPU) and user retention rates to inform product development and enhance long-term profitability.

What we offer

  • Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom of working from anywhere, anytime, fostering a better work-life balance.

  • Stock options: We acknowledge the commitment required for the COO role. Hence, we offer generous company stock options and revenue sharing to appreciate and reward your hard work.

  • Company-provided MacBook: We offer employees access to powerful MacBooks if needed, ensuring top-notch performance, energy efficiency, and seamless productivity.

Life at Ruby Labs

At Ruby Labs, we are more than a team; we're a community united in pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation. Our combined passion fuels our ambition for excellence, driving impact that resonates around the globe.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and celebrate diversity, recognizing that a diversity of thought and backgrounds builds stronger teams. We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, religion, color, place of birth, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, military service status, or disability status. Join us and be part of a company that is crafting the future of technology across multiple industries.

#Li-Remote

title: [PropTech] CEO/Managing Director | Ruby Labs
description:
About us

Ruby Labs is a leading tech company that creates and operates innovative consumer products. We offer a diverse range of opportunities across the health, education, and entertainment industries. Our innovative teams are driving the future of consumer-led products, and we're always looking for passionate individuals to join us. Learn more about our story at: https://rubylabs.com/about-us/

Role

We are creating a new product in the PropTech category, specifically an FTMO-style funded trading platform. We are looking for a Managing Director who can take care of day-to-day operations, execution, and building a world-class team. The platform will offer traders the opportunity to trade with company capital after passing evaluation challenges, similar to established services like FundedNext and FundedPips.

Profit Share

This role comes with the profit share incentive and stock option that is quite generous for this role, more details would be shared at the interview.

The team

You will be building a strong team with high talent density who enjoy working in our fast-paced, 100% remote environment.

Employment

We offer an Independent Contractor Agreement for this position.

About you

You are a dynamic and hands-on leader with extensive experience in the direct to consumer products (preferably prop-tech, forex, trading or subscriptions). You excel at driving growth and innovation, with a deep understanding of engineering, product, marketing, and growth strategies. In this role, you will be at the forefront, leading all departments with a focus on executing strategic initiatives and optimizing performance across the board. Your proven ability to manage teams, deliver results under pressure, and deeply engage in the technical and operational aspects of the business makes you the ideal candidate to steer our company towards continued success.

What you‚Äôll do

  • Lead the company's strategic growth by developing and executing initiatives that drive business expansion, optimize market positioning, and advance overall progress.

  • Lead cross-functional teams in executing complex strategic initiatives, ensuring alignment across engineering, product development, growth, marketing, and sales.

  • Drive revenue growth and profitability while optimizing operational expenses.

  • Oversee the product development lifecycle, from ideation to launch, ensuring products meet market needs and quality standards.

  • Collaborate closely with engineering teams to deliver innovative solutions that align with customer expectations and business goals.

  • Demonstrate a solid understanding of engineering concepts, including current trends such as artificial intelligence (AI), and best practices like modern code patterns and DevOps practices.

  • Ensure that the product roadmap is aligned with business strategy and customer feedback.

  • Oversee marketing campaigns, ensuring they are data-driven, customer-centric, and aligned with product launches and sales strategies.

  • Utilize data analytics to refine and optimize growth strategies, ensuring sustainable revenue growth.

  • Continuously monitor and analyze key financial and operational metrics, such as revenue growth, EBITDA margins, and customer acquisition costs (CAC).

  • Evaluate customer lifetime value (LTV) and return on ad spend (ROAS) to optimize marketing efficiency and resource allocation.

  • Track onboarding conversion rates to identify areas for improvement in user experience and increase customer activation and analyze average revenue per user (ARPU) and user retention rates to inform product development and enhance long-term profitability.

What we offer

  • Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom of working from anywhere, anytime, fostering a better work-life balance.

  • Stock options: We acknowledge the commitment required for the COO role. Hence, we offer generous company stock options and revenue sharing to appreciate and reward your hard work.

  • Company-provided MacBook: We offer employees access to powerful MacBooks if needed, ensuring top-notch performance, energy efficiency, and seamless productivity.

Life at Ruby Labs

At Ruby Labs, we are more than a team; we're a community united in pushing the boundaries of technology and innovation. Our combined passion fuels our ambition for excellence, driving impact that resonates around the globe.

We are an equal-opportunity employer and celebrate diversity, recognizing that a diversity of thought and backgrounds builds stronger teams. We approach diversity and inclusion seriously and thoughtfully. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, religion, color, place of birth, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, military service status, or disability status. Join us and be part of a company that is crafting the future of technology across multiple industries.

#Li-Remote

title: Motion Designer
description:
About us

Hint is a popular astrology app with over 35 million downloads, providing hyper-personalized astrology services through its digital subscription product. The insights offered by Hint are uniquely crafted for each individual by combining the knowledge of our professional human astrologers with our AI engine.

About the role

As a Creative Designer, you will be responsible for creating and designing a wide range of creatives (including static images and videos) for performance and branding campaigns across multiple platforms such as Google, Facebook, TikTok, and others. Your designs will play a crucial role in our marketing efforts, driving engagement and conversions. Experience in entertainment and fintech apps is a significant plus, as it will enable you to create designs that resonate with our target audience.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and design high-quality creatives (including static images and videos) for performance and branding campaigns across various digital channels.

  • Collaborate with the marketing team to understand campaign objectives and create designs that align with our brand and marketing goals.

  • Produce engaging and effective creatives for Google, Facebook, TikTok, and other advertising platforms.

  • Ensure all designs adhere to brand guidelines and maintain a consistent visual identity across all marketing materials.

  • Stay updated with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies to ensure our creatives are cutting-edge and effective.

  • Work closely with the marketing and content teams to brainstorm and develop creative concepts and ideas.

  • Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and high-quality output.

  • Utilize feedback from stakeholders to continuously refine and improve designs.

Technical qualifications

  • Design Software: Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro) and other design tools. Efficiency with AI tools is a plus.

  • Video Editing and Animation: Strong skills in video editing and animation, particularly for creating engaging video ads.

  • Creative Thinking: Ability to think creatively and develop innovative design concepts that capture attention and drive engagement.

  • Attention to Detail: Strong attention to detail, ensuring all designs are visually appealing and free of errors.

  • Time Management: Excellent time management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Nice to have

  • Background in fintech, with particular expertise in topics like investing, to create designs that resonate with our specific target audience.

  • Background in entertainment, with particular expertise in dating apps or astrology apps.

Location

Hint operates within the CET (Central European Time) time zone. Applicants from any country are welcome to apply for the position as long as they are located within approximately ¬± 4 hours of CET. This ensures optimal collaboration and communication during working hours.

Benefits

Discover the perks of being part of our vibrant team! We offer:

  • Remote Work Environment: Embrace the freedom to work from anywhere, anytime, promoting a healthy work-life balance. üè°‚è∞

  • Unlimited PTO: Enjoy unlimited paid time off to recharge and prioritize your well-being, without counting days. üå¥üíº

  • Paid National Holidays: Celebrate and relax on national holidays with paid time off to unwind and recharge. üéâüåü

  • Company-provided MacBook: Experience seamless productivity with top-notch Apple MacBooks provided to all employees who need them. üíªüöÄ

  • Flexible Independent Contractor Agreement: Unlock the benefits of flexibility, autonomy, and entrepreneurial opportunities. Benefit from tax advantages, networking opportunities, reduced employment obligations, and the freedom to work from anywhere. Read more about it here: https://wiki.rubylabs.com/s/b11227c3-fa74-4c39-bd1d-3e59056a2cf4 üìàüíº

Be part of our fast-growing team and seize this excellent opportunity for personal and professional growth!

Life at Hint

By joining Hint, you‚Äôll become part of a team that picks each other up, collaborates daily, and works hard, fast, and intelligent because they‚Äôre motivated and passionate about being the best in the industry. We thrive on innovation, push the boundaries, and are proud of our work!

#Li-Remote

title: Senior Production Risk Engineer - Professional Liability
Technical Documentation Specialist
description:
Who are we?

We are Juakali, a FinTech start-up providing a platform for the microfinance lending market. Juakali empowers Financial Institutions with seamless, flexible, and powerful tools designed to boost their productivity. 100% bank-grade, best-of-breed technology.

Although we are a small start-up, we are already global, our people work from all around the world. In the span of 4 years, we have employees and customers in more than 10 countries in Africa and Asia. Our teams are remote, working from wherever they are. It gives our people freedom; we only ask them to be responsible.

You can work from anywhere you like as well as long as you have an internet connection, our office is located in Slack.

What role will you play?

The need for clear instruction is vital in business, we are looking for a skilled technical writer who can typically develop product manuals, how-to guides, website help sections, journal articles, user guides, API Developer guides, and other content that distils technical information with ease and clarity.

  • Develop Inclusive documentation that meets organisation needs.
  • Research, outline, write and edit new and existing content.
  • Writing user-friendly content that meets the need for technical information and ease of understanding.
  • Obtain a deep understanding of products and services and translate complex information into simple and engaging formats going beyond traditional documentation.
  • Create in-depth user guides, FAQs, technical overviews, and in-product help documentation database.
  • Independently gather information from various departments and sources to develop, organize, and write procedure manuals, technical specifications, and process documentation, and other documents.
  • Work with development and support team leads to identify all documentation repositories and determine the best solution for data compilation and centralized storage.
  • Create, and maintain information architecture templates that uphold organizational and legal standards, and allow for easy data migration

We are a small team, so every person has the opportunity to make a big impact and leave their marks on every project. You will help in shaping and uplifting a company from the start.

What are we looking for?

  • Minimum 4 years of experience as a technical writer
  • Strong written and verbal communication and working experience with content in multiple mediums
  • Strong experience in owning end-to-end documentation creation processes.
  • Excellent attention to detail and the ability to prioritize and work on multiple projects in a fast-paced, changing environment.
  • Familiarity with API documentation for REST or. NET APIs.
  • Experience in creating documentation for audiences with different levels of technical skill (from end-users to developers)
  • Ideally, some initial understanding of the business (exposed to microfinance/banking industries, especially for tech companies)
  • Working remotely requires you to be autonomous, proactive, and accountable for your work.

What will be advantageous to have?

  • Experience working with the following tools preferred: Confluence/JIRA, Github, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and microservices.
  • Past experience in the same domain

Why us?

Fast learning environment within a team of cheerful, passionate, talented people. Opportunity to interact and work with international people from all over the globe. You will find it easy to keep a good work-life balance.

You will be closely working with industry experts to have a positive impact on the business of our customers.

Opportunity to drive transformation in one of the fastest-growing industries. The local contract includes a pension fund and health insurance for you and your family.

About the company

We simplify Financial Services Providers' life by eliminating paperwork & automating valueless tasks, so that your employees make the most of their time at work and you boost your productivity. Although we are a small start-up, we are already global, our people work from all around the world. Our teams are remote, working from wherever they are. It gives our people freedom; we only ask them to be responsible.

title: Support Executive (Night shift)
description:
About Us: 

Take the Clearer route to smart career growth. At Clearer.io, we‚Äôre reimagining eCommerce by enhancing search, discovery, and customer engagement through a standout suite of innovative apps. Our mission is straightforward yet powerful: to empower our partners with solutions that streamline their operations, foster customer trust, and drive sustainable growth. We‚Äôre not just about technology‚Äîwe‚Äôre about making eCommerce smarter, simpler, and more impactful, delivering solutions that inspire confidence and create real results.
With fresh investment and rapid growth, this is the perfect time to join our journey. When you become part of Clearer.io, you step into a role where your work truly matters. Here, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to own your projects, drive outcomes, and make an impact within a supportive, diverse team of professionals dedicated to customer success. We value clarity, results, and a customer-centric approach that keeps us focused on delivering real value to our partners every step of the way.
If you‚Äôre ready to cut through the clutter and focus on what really matters in a dynamic eCommerce landscape, Clearer.io is the place to grow, lead, and shape the future of online retail. Join us, and be part of a team that‚Äôs committed to making eCommerce clearer, more efficient, and more rewarding for everyone.

Your impact:
Clearer.io is seeking a Support Executive to join our Support team. As a Support Executive you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and collaborate with top-notch professionals to deliver exceptional service to our clients.
About Us: 

Take the Clearer route to smart career growth. At Clearer.io, we‚Äôre reimagining eCommerce by enhancing search, discovery, and customer engagement through a standout suite of innovative apps. Our mission is straightforward yet powerful: to empower our partners with solutions that streamline their operations, foster customer trust, and drive sustainable growth. We‚Äôre not just about technology‚Äîwe‚Äôre about making eCommerce smarter, simpler, and more impactful, delivering solutions that inspire confidence and create real results.
With fresh investment and rapid growth, this is the perfect time to join our journey. When you become part of Clearer.io, you step into a role where your work truly matters. Here, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to own your projects, drive outcomes, and make an impact within a supportive, diverse team of professionals dedicated to customer success. We value clarity, results, and a customer-centric approach that keeps us focused on delivering real value to our partners every step of the way.
If you‚Äôre ready to cut through the clutter and focus on what really matters in a dynamic eCommerce landscape, Clearer.io is the place to grow, lead, and shape the future of online retail. Join us, and be part of a team that‚Äôs committed to making eCommerce clearer, more efficient, and more rewarding for everyone.

Your impact:
Clearer.io is seeking a Support Executive to join our Support team. As a Support Executive you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and collaborate with top-notch professionals to deliver exceptional service to our clients.

What you'll do:

  • Responding to inquiries via live chat and calls.
  • Owning your customer‚Äôs enquiry from initial live chat to diagnosing the customer‚Äôs problem and updating the customer throughout.
  • Collaborating with product teams to pinpoint issues and providing insightful opinions on potential solutions based on diverse customer feedback.
  • Developing an in-depth understanding of AppHub‚Äôs core app functionalities and capabilities to become a knowledge resource.

    • What you‚Äôll bring:

  • At least 1+ years of customer support experience in a software product company.
  • You enjoy solving problems. You love taking on challenges. You don‚Äôt get flustered easily. If you don‚Äôt know the answer, you‚Äôll keep going until you find it. 
  • You like helping people. You get a kick out of getting people to those aha! Moments - (and there's a lot of those).
  • You pay attention to the details. You stay focused and nothing is overlooked.
  • You think on your feet. You like learning new things and you can learn quickly. When things change, you know how to roll with it.
  • You are motivated and driven. You‚Äôre going to take ownership of your time with and truly make a difference. 
    • Preferred Qualifications:
  • IELTS > 6.

    • Why choose Clearer.io?

  • Customer-First: Everything we do is for our customers, with real people ready to listen, understand, and help them succeed.
  • Growth-Focused: We‚Äôre not just selling apps‚Äîwe‚Äôre delivering results. We make eCommerce growth easy and intuitive.
  • Clear and Simple: Our solutions work seamlessly, so you‚Äôll enjoy an environment that‚Äôs direct, down-to-earth, and driven by genuine connections.
  • Supportive Team: You‚Äôll join a diverse team that values collaboration, empowerment, and a shared vision for success.
    • Clear Benefits:
  • 100% Remote Culture: Work from anywhere that brings you happiness.
  • Performance-based Year-End Bonus: Recognizing and rewarding your individual contributions.
  • Wellness Allowance: Support for classes promoting physical and mental health.
  • Time Off: 20 days/year, in addition to Vietnam holidays.
  • MacBook Provided.
  • Collaborative Events: Offline meet-ups, monthly gatherings, year-end party, and company trips.
  • Continuous Learning: Technical and general workshops and online resources.
  • Health and Wellness Benefits: Generali Health Care Insurance, annual check-up.
  • International Exposure: Enhance expertise and English communication skills.

    • Working hours:

  • 10:00 PM ‚Äì 6:00 AM (GMT+7), Monday to Friday with one Saturday per month.

title: Head of Growth Marketing
description:
Take the Clearer route to smart career growth.
At Clearer.io, we‚Äôre reimagining eCommerce by enhancing search, discovery, and customer engagement through a standout suite of innovative apps. Our mission is straightforward yet powerful: to empower our partners with solutions that streamline their operations, foster customer trust, and drive sustainable growth. We‚Äôre not just about technology‚Äîwe‚Äôre about making eCommerce smarter, simpler, and more impactful, delivering solutions that inspire confidence and create real results.

With fresh investment and rapid growth, this is the perfect time to join our journey. When you become part of clearer.io, you step into a role where your work truly matters. Here, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to own your projects, drive outcomes, and make an impact within a supportive, diverse team of professionals dedicated to customer success. We value clarity, results, and a customer-centric approach that keeps us focused on delivering real value to our partners every step of the way. If you‚Äôre ready to cut through the clutter and focus on what really matters in a dynamic eCommerce landscape, clearer.io is the place to grow, lead, and shape the future of online retail. Join us, and be part of a team that‚Äôs committed to making eCommerce clearer, more efficient, and more rewarding for everyone.

Your Impact:
As Head of Growth Marketing, you will develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy to accelerate growth, build brand authority, and drive product adoption. In this pivotal role, you‚Äôll manage a high-performing team and collaborate with Sales, Product, and Customer Success to achieve ambitious revenue and growth targets. You‚Äôll craft a compelling brand narrative, deliver impactful campaigns, and position clearer.io as a leader in smart discovery. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in B2B SaaS marketing, with deep expertise in demand generation, content marketing, product marketing, and data-driven decision-making. As VP of Marketing this is your opportunity  to lead with purpose and innovation, driving measurable results while advancing our mission to make eCommerce smarter, simpler, and clearer.

Your Impact:
As Head of Growth Marketing, you will develop and execute a comprehensive marketing strategy to accelerate growth, build brand authority, and drive product adoption. In this pivotal role, you‚Äôll manage a high-performing team and collaborate with Sales, Product, and Customer Success to achieve ambitious revenue and growth targets. You‚Äôll craft a compelling brand narrative, deliver impactful campaigns, and position clearer.io as a leader in smart discovery. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in B2B SaaS marketing, with deep expertise in demand generation, content marketing, product marketing, and data-driven decision-making. As VP of Marketing this is your opportunity  to lead with purpose and innovation, driving measurable results while advancing our mission to make eCommerce smarter, simpler, and clearer.

What you'll do:

  • Marketing Strategy & Leadership: Develop and implement an integrated marketing strategy aligned with the company‚Äôs growth and revenue goals, incorporating the use of data and AI to inform decisions and drive innovation.
  • Build, lead, and mentor a high-performing marketing team across demand generation, product marketing, content strategy, and digital marketing.
  • Oversee budget management, resource allocation, and performance monitoring to ensure marketing initiatives deliver a strong return on investment.
  • Demand Generation & Customer Acquisition: Drive scalable, predictable growth through multi-channel demand generation strategies, including paid media, content strategy, email, SEO, and events.
  • Utilize marketing automation tools to streamline lead generation and nurturing programs, ensuring consistent engagement with prospects.
  • Work closely with Sales to align on lead scoring, nurturing, and conversion metrics to maximize MQL to SQL conversion rates.
  • Product Marketing: Develop compelling messaging and positioning that resonates with target audiences and differentiates our products from competitors.
  • Oversee product launches with effective go-to-market strategies that drive awareness, adoption, and engagement.
  • Conduct market research to stay informed on industry trends, customer needs, and competitive positioning.
  • Brand Development & Content Marketing: Enhance brand visibility and authority in the eCommerce space through storytelling and thought leadership content, including case studies, webinars, and more.
  • Lead the creation of engaging, high-quality content that educates, informs, and inspires the target audience, guided by a strong content strategy.
  • Manage PR, social media, and other channels to maintain a cohesive and impactful brand presence.
  • Data-Driven Insights & Optimization: Implement and optimize analytics tools to measure the impact of all marketing efforts and report on key metrics.
  • Leverage data and AI to inform strategies, ensuring all marketing efforts are results-oriented and ROI-focused.
  • Use customer insights and analytics to continuously improve marketing strategies and tactics.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Partner closely with Sales, Product, and Customer Success teams to ensure alignment across departments and consistent messaging.
  • Act as a key voice in strategic planning and product development discussions, bringing customer and market perspectives to the table.

    • What you'll bring:

  • 10+ years of B2B marketing experience, with 5+ in a leadership role, ideally in SaaS or tech.
  • Proven expertise in scaling demand generation strategies to drive consistent and sustained revenue and growth in middle market businesses.
  • High accountability with a demonstrated track record of exceeding performance targets.
  • Skilled in product positioning, messaging, and go-to-market strategies for B2B SaaS.
  • Strong analytical abilities to make data-driven decisions and optimize marketing performance.
  • Demonstrated success building and leading high-performing, collaborative teams.
  • Strategic thinker with hands-on execution and a deep understanding of the B2B SaaS buyer journey.
  • Exceptional communication skills, with a talent for crafting compelling messaging.
  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.

    • Why clearer.io??

  • Customer-First: Everything we do is for our customers, with real people ready to listen, understand, and help them succeed.
  • Growth-Focused: We‚Äôre not just selling apps‚Äîwe‚Äôre delivering results. We make eCommerce growth easy and intuitive.
  • Clear and Simple: Our solutions work seamlessly, so you‚Äôll enjoy an environment that‚Äôs direct, down-to-earth, and driven by genuine connections.
  • Supportive Team: You‚Äôll join a diverse team that values collaboration, empowerment, and a shared vision for success.
  • Clear Benefits: Comprehensive Benefits Packages
    • Be a part of clearer.io‚Äîwhere your expertise fuels real change in eCommerce. Come and join us- it‚Äôs clear we‚Äôre the place to be!

Your impact:
Clearer.io is seeking a talented Senior UI Designer with extensive experience in UX/UI to join our Product Design team.
As a Senior UI Designer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping exceptional user experiences across our digital products. This role requires a blend of creativity, collaboration, and technical expertise to design and refine user interfaces that are both intuitive and visually appealing. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful designs that drive user satisfaction and business success.

What you‚Äôll do:

  • Craft user interfaces for our products with a strong emphasis on delivering seamless and engaging user experiences while adhering to established design systems.
  • Create, maintain, and enhance design system components to ensure consistency and scalability across all products.
  • Design graphic illustrations, icons, and AI-generated images that align with our product‚Äôs style and the overall design system.
  • Develop high-quality mockups and prototypes to communicate user flows, interactions, and proof of concepts effectively.
  • Partner with Product Managers and engineering teams throughout the development cycle to ensure design requirements are clearly defined and implemented.  
  • Research and develop tailored design systems based on product requirements, whether for e-commerce websites, B2B applications, or other scopes.
  • Identify and troubleshoot UX/UI challenges, implementing user-centered solutions that elevate the design.
  • Stay updated on the latest design trends and propose innovative ideas to enhance our applications and marketing websites.
  • Deepen your understanding of our products and technologies to create simplified, highly usable, and impactful product experiences.
  • Leverage customer feedback and analytics data to refine and optimize the performance of new and existing features.
  • Demonstrate the flexibility to work effectively with global teams across different time zones and cultures.
  • Thrive in both independent projects and collaborative team environments, ensuring the highest quality of work.

    • What you‚Äôll bring:

  • At least 3+ years of professional experience in UI Design.
  • A portfolio showcasing excellence in interaction design, visual design.
  • Proficiency in Figma, including advanced features like Components, Auto Layout, and Responsive Design.
  • Strong expertise in the Adobe Creative Suite for graphic and UI asset creation.
  • Strong English skills‚Äîboth written and spoken‚Äîto effectively communicate and collaborate with global, cross-functional teams.
  • Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Design, with a focus on UI, or related arts fields.
  • Good time management skills.A meticulous eye for detail, ensuring high-quality designs.
  • Demonstrated experience designing for SaaS/PaaS products.
  • Hands-on experience building and applying design systems to ensure consistency and scalability across products.
  • Deep understanding of user-centered design principles, best practices, and inclusive design.
  • Familiarity with accessibility standards and a strong desire to continue learning in this area.
  • Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining focus and delivering results.

    • Why choose Clearer.io?

  • Customer-First: Everything we do is for our customers, with real people ready to listen, understand, and help them succeed.
  • Growth-Focused: We‚Äôre not just selling apps‚Äîwe‚Äôre delivering results. We make eCommerce growth easy and intuitive.
  • Clear and Simple: Our solutions work seamlessly, so you‚Äôll enjoy an environment that‚Äôs direct, down-to-earth, and driven by genuine connections.
  • Supportive Team: You‚Äôll join a diverse team that values collaboration, empowerment, and a shared vision for success.

    • Clear Benefits:
  • 100% Remote Culture: Work from anywhere that brings you happiness.
  • Performance-based Year-End Bonus: Recognizing and rewarding your individual contributions.
  • Wellness Allowance: Support for classes promoting physical and mental health.
  • Time Off: 20 days/year, in addition to Vietnam holidays.
  • MacBook Provided.
  • Collaborative Events: Offline meet-ups, monthly gatherings, year-end party, and company trips.
  • Continuous Learning: Technical and general workshops and online resources.
  • Health and Wellness Benefits: General Health Care, annual check-up.
  • International Exposure: Enhance expertise and English communication skills.

    • Working hours: 8:00 AM ‚Äì 5:00 PM (GMT+7), Monday to Friday.

title: Technical Product Manager
(Senior) Production Risk Engineer - Management Liability (Northwest)
(Senior) Production Risk Engineer - Management Liability (Southeast)
Claims Manager
SaaS Solutions Architect (Post Sales Implementation)
description:
Zingtree is the next gen, intelligent process automation platform that reimagines customer experience operations for top Customer Support leaders. With over 500 customers, including global enterprises like Optum, Corpay, Sony, SharkNinja, and Allianz, Zingtree transforms self-service, uncovers and implements automation opportunities, and makes every customer service agent an expert.

We are seeking a SaaS Solutions Architect with project management skills. The role is an individual contributor who is a hands-on problem-solver capable of executing end-to-end implementations. In this role, you will guide clients through the technical aspects of the implementation process, from initial systems integrations to workflow design and build, to go-live. You‚Äôll work closely with both client stakeholders and internal teams to manage project timelines, configure integrations, oversee AI workflow enablement, and ensure our solutions meet customer-specific needs. This role requires a unique blend of technical expertise, project management skills, and customer-centric mindset. 
Zingtree is the next gen, intelligent process automation platform that reimagines customer experience operations for top Customer Support leaders. With over 500 customers, including global enterprises like Optum, Corpay, Sony, SharkNinja, and Allianz, Zingtree transforms self-service, uncovers and implements automation opportunities, and makes every customer service agent an expert.

We are seeking a SaaS Solutions Architect with project management skills. The role is an individual contributor who is a hands-on problem-solver capable of executing end-to-end implementations. In this role, you will guide clients through the technical aspects of the implementation process, from initial systems integrations to workflow design and build, to go-live. You‚Äôll work closely with both client stakeholders and internal teams to manage project timelines, configure integrations, oversee AI workflow enablement, and ensure our solutions meet customer-specific needs. This role requires a unique blend of technical expertise, project management skills, and customer-centric mindset. 
Zingtree is committed to internal pay equity and offers a competitive compensation package, including base salary, equity, and benefits. Our benefits package includes premium medical, dental, and vision benefits, paid parental leave, a flexible paid time off policy, and monthly work from home stipends. 

For cash compensation, Zingtree sets standard ranges for all roles based on function, level, and geographic location, benchmarked against similar-stage growth companies. The US pay range  for this role is $150,000 - $200,000 a year. Final offers are adjusted based on geographic location, candidate experience, and expertise. 

Zingtree provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Responsibilities

  • Solution Design & Customization: Design, demo and build tailored AI workflows and integrations that meet customer support objectives.
  • Technical Configuration & Integration: Coordinate with client IT resources to oversee the technical configuration of integrations with client CRM systems, APIs, and other third-party tools, ensuring seamless data flow and system compatibility.
  • Client Onboarding & Planning: Participate in onboarding sessions to gather requirements, understand customer business processes, and confirm project goals and timelines.
  • Stakeholder Collaboration: Act as the primary technical point of contact for clients throughout the project lifecycle, providing regular updates and managing expectations. Operate as the technical liaison to translate requirements between client business and IT resources, as well internally with team members
  • Risk & Issue Management: Identify and mitigate project risks; resolve technical and process-related issues to prevent project delays.
  • Testing & Validation: Guide UAT (User Acceptance Testing) with clients, ensuring workflows and integrations function as intended and meet defined objectives.
  • Training & Enablement: Participate in platform and user training sessions to ensure customers are equipped to build and maintain AI-enabled features, workflows, and reports.
  • Go-Live & Post-Implementation Support: Accountable for clients success through the go-live process, and ensure a smooth handoff to Customer Success and Support teams for ongoing service.
  • Project Management: Coordinate and collaborate on multiple SaaS implementation projects, adhering to project timeline and scope while maintaining high-quality standards.

    • Qualifications

  • Experience: 7+ years in a solutions architect, customer engineering, technical project implementation roles, with at least 4+ years in enterprise B2B SaaS, preferably in customer support or contact center solutions, and with start-up experience.
  • Technical Skills: Hands-on experience with automation technologies, middleware, integration architecture patterns, authentication protocols, web services technologies, enterprise messaging patterns, APIs, SOA, ESB, BPM, SDKs, and Databases. Front-end development skills, including custom coding (JS, CSS) and data objects (JSON, ETL); ability to understand and explain technical requirements related to AI technology, large language models, prompt engineering, agentic AI-led workflows and integrations. Experience building integrations to packaged CRMs, specifically Salesforce and Zendesk are a plus.
  • Business Acumen: Specializes in digesting complex business requirements and designing comprehensive and integrated workflow solutions that are flexible and adaptable to the client's needs.
  • Analytical Mindset: Proficient in troubleshooting technical challenges and collaborating with cross-functional teams to find solutions. Ability to quickly understand operational processes and identify areas the technology can condense and/or optimize the processes.
  • Client-Facing Expertise: Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills; experience interfacing with customers to manage expectations, resolve issues, and ensure project success. Ability to clearly articulate technical topics to a non-technical audience, including experience working with executives.
  • Project Management: Strong organizational and project management skills.
  • Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent work experience).

    • What we offer

  • Competitive Compensation with opportunity for discretionary bonus
  • Comprehensive Health Benefits - 100% of employee premiums and 75%-80% of dependent premiums on most health, dental, and vision insurance are covered by us
  • 401K plans - Add to your retirement planning
  • Paid Parental Leave - Paid time off for parents to spend time with their new child
  • Unlimited PTO - Take the time you need to recharge and bring your best self to work 
  • Flexible Remote Work - Work from anywhere
  • Co-Working Reimbursement - Expense up to $200 a month on co-working space
  • Home Office Stipend - Receive up to $500 to create a great work environment at home, and $100 a month for Internet, phone, etc.

title: Manager of IT and Information Security
description:
Take the clearer route to growth.
At clearer.io, we‚Äôre reimagining eCommerce with a powerful suite of apps that take search, discovery, and customer connection to the next level. Our mission? Simple: make it easy for our partners to thrive, with solutions that deliver growth, efficiency, and standout results. And we‚Äôre more than just tech‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to guide, support, and empower our customers every step of the way.

Now‚Äôs the time to join clearer.io. With fresh investment and rapid growth, we‚Äôre expanding our global team of driven professionals who share a clear vision for customer success. Here, you‚Äôll take charge of your work, make an impact, and be part of a team that values clarity, results, and real connection. If you‚Äôre ready to cut out the clutter, drive real results, and lead in a dynamic eCommerce environment, clearer.io is where you‚Äôll find purpose, growth, and opportunity. Join us, and help shape the future of eCommerce.

Your Impact:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Manager of IT and Information Security to oversee and manage the company‚Äôs IT operations, including employee help desk, and the implementation and maintenance of information security strategies. This role will ensure the smooth functioning of IT services while safeguarding the organization‚Äôs digital assets and maintaining compliance with industry standards.  You will collaborate closely with internal stakeholders, external partners, and other portfolio companies to identify security risks, implement robust security solutions, and ensure compliance with industry regulations and best practices.  This position will report to the CTO.


Take the clearer route to growth.
At clearer.io, we‚Äôre reimagining eCommerce with a powerful suite of apps that take search, discovery, and customer connection to the next level. Our mission? Simple: make it easy for our partners to thrive, with solutions that deliver growth, efficiency, and standout results. And we‚Äôre more than just tech‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to guide, support, and empower our customers every step of the way.

Now‚Äôs the time to join clearer.io. With fresh investment and rapid growth, we‚Äôre expanding our global team of driven professionals who share a clear vision for customer success. Here, you‚Äôll take charge of your work, make an impact, and be part of a team that values clarity, results, and real connection. If you‚Äôre ready to cut out the clutter, drive real results, and lead in a dynamic eCommerce environment, clearer.io is where you‚Äôll find purpose, growth, and opportunity. Join us, and help shape the future of eCommerce.

Your Impact:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Manager of IT and Information Security to oversee and manage the company‚Äôs IT operations, including employee help desk, and the implementation and maintenance of information security strategies. This role will ensure the smooth functioning of IT services while safeguarding the organization‚Äôs digital assets and maintaining compliance with industry standards.  You will collaborate closely with internal stakeholders, external partners, and other portfolio companies to identify security risks, implement robust security solutions, and ensure compliance with industry regulations and best practices.  This position will report to the CTO.


What you'll do:

  • Information Security Management
  • Develop and implement security policies, procedures, and standards to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry best practices.
  • Coordinate regular security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration tests to identify and remediate security vulnerabilities and weaknesses.
  • Monitor and analyze security events and incidents, investigate security incidents, and provide incident response and remediation support as needed.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate security controls into software engineering, business processes and IT systems and provide security guidance and recommendations to various teams and portfolio companies.
  • Stay abreast of emerging threats, vulnerabilities, and security technologies, and provide guidance and recommendations for enhancing the company‚Äôs security posture.
  • Participate in security audits, assessments, and compliance reviews, and assist in responding to security-related inquiries from investors and regulatory authorities.
  • Train employees on security awareness and ensure adherence to security protocols.
  • Information Technology
  • Manage endpoint security, including antivirus, patch management, and encryption solutions for desktops, laptops, and mobile devices.
  • Ensure proper configuration and maintenance of network hardware, firewalls, VPNs, and other critical infrastructure components, working closley with our DevOps team.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve escalated network and connectivity issues in a timely manner.
  • Lead the team in providing efficient and responsive technical support to employees across the organization.
  • Implement and manage ticketing systems and workflows to prioritize and address IT support requests effectively.
  • Oversee the provisioning and decommissioning of employee devices and accounts.
  • Ensure timely setup, maintenance, and upgrades of hardware and software to minimize downtime and maximize productivity.
  • Develop and maintain a knowledge base and self-service resources for common IT support issues.

    • What you'll bring:

  • Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science, Information Security, or related field; or relevant work experience
  • Proven experience (5+ years) in information technology, with a focus on designing, implementing, and managing security controls and solutions in a corporate environment.
  • Strong knowledge of operating systems (Windows and macOS) and enterprise productivity tools (e.g., Microsoft 365, Google Workspace).
  • Experience with security frameworks and standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001, SOC 2) and regulatory compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, PCI DSS).
  • Familiarity with IT service management (ITSM) tools, endpoint management, and asset tracking solutions.
  • Strong leadership and team management capabilities, with the ability to build and motivate a high-performing IT team.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex security issues, prioritize tasks, and develop effective solutions.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, and manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously.
  • Willing  and able to travel to branch offices as needed.

    • Why Clearer.io

  • Customer-First: Everything we do is for our customers, with real people ready to listen, understand, and help them succeed.
  • Growth-Focused: We‚Äôre not just selling apps‚Äîwe‚Äôre delivering results. We make eCommerce growth easy and intuitive.
  • Clear and Simple: Our solutions work seamlessly, so you‚Äôll enjoy an environment that‚Äôs direct, down-to-earth, and driven by genuine connections.
  • Supportive Team: You‚Äôll join a diverse team that values collaboration, empowerment, and a shared vision for success.
  • Clear Benefits: Comprehensive private medical benefits
    • Be a part of clearer.io‚Äîwhere your expertise fuels real change in eCommerce. Come and join us- it‚Äôs clear we‚Äôre the place to be!
